sentences.sentence: Recognizing the name of one of our consuls, I replied, somewhat taken aback.
sentences.translation: 我听出他说的是我们一个领事的姓名，我莫名其妙地接着说

sentences.sentence: An office of high rank, entrusted only to men who had previously served as consuls, the censorship encompassed financial and accounting responsibilities related to taxation and population management.
sentences.translation: 高阶级的职位，只交托给曾担任过执政官的人，其监察职责包括跟人口和税赋管理有关的金融与会计。

sentences.sentence: A group of teachers, Consuls General in Guangzhou, will show you how to pay New Year calls in Cantonese.
sentences.translation: 我们邀请了一群特殊的老师，驻穗总领事用粤语为大家带来新年祝福啦！
